list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor PDF handling with OCR and project structure updates
Added OCR-based text extraction for scanned PDFs using Tesseract. Improved project structure with separate directories for input files and outputs (text and OCR). Updated `.idea` configuration for better IDE compatibility and version control setup.

task.summary:
Add Home.py and project configuration file
Created a new Python script `Home.py` and initialized project configuration with `.idea/DBDT_Breakdown_Project.iml`. These changes set up the project's structure and environment.

Add PDF text extraction script and sample input/output files
Introduced functionality to extract text from PDF files using PyMuPDF and save it into a text file. Included a sample PDF (`Certificate.pdf`) as input and an example extracted text file (`output.txt`) for demonstration. This provides a basic framework for handling PDF text extraction.

Refactor PDF extraction to include metadata and page-wise text
Reorganized the script to extract metadata into a JSON file and save each page's text as separate .txt files. Added encoding detection using `chardet` to handle character encodings. Updated directory structure and improved error handling for better robustness.

Refactor PDF handling with OCR and project structure updates
Added OCR-based text extraction for scanned PDFs using Tesseract. Improved project structure with separate directories for input files and outputs (text and OCR). Updated `.idea` configuration for better IDE compatibility and version control setup.

MESSAGE.value:
Add Home.py and project configuration file
Created a new Python script `Home.py` and initialized project configuration with `.idea/DBDT_Breakdown_Project.iml`. These changes set up the project's structure and environment.

Add PDF text extraction script and sample input/output files
Introduced functionality to extract text from PDF files using PyMuPDF and save it into a text file. Included a sample PDF (`Certificate.pdf`) as input and an example extracted text file (`output.txt`) for demonstration. This provides a basic framework for handling PDF text extraction.

Refactor PDF extraction to include metadata and page-wise text
Reorganized the script to extract metadata into a JSON file and save each page's text as separate .txt files. Added encoding detection using `chardet` to handle character encodings. Updated directory structure and improved error handling for better robustness.

Refactor PDF handling with OCR and project structure updates
Added OCR-based text extraction for scanned PDFs using Tesseract. Improved project structure with separate directories for input files and outputs (text and OCR). Updated `.idea` configuration for better IDE compatibility and version control setup.
